element-citation.article-title: Association between Zika virus infection and microcephaly in Brazil, January to May, 2016: preliminary report of a case-control study

ref.mixed-citation: 8. De Araujo TVB, Rodrigues LC, de Alencar Ximenes RA, de Barros Miranda-Filho D, Montarroyos UR, de Melo APL, et al. Association between Zika virus infection and microcephaly in Brazil, January to May, 2016: preliminary report of a case-control study. Lancet Infect Dis. 2016;16(12):1356-63.
